TopicTitle: Long time lurker finally took the plunge...

Articles.Content:
Hello all.

Been watching Youtube videos of KSP for way to long, so finally took the plunge.

What can I say, I am hooked.

Love the whole "career" mode, as I think this was the main reason I finally gave in and parted with some cash.

Hope to use this forum to the max.

Fly safe,

Steve

Hello and welcome!

Be sure to take screenshots and post any interesting explosions with us all.
Welcome, fellow former lurker, to the forums! Enjoy your stay.

Welcome, fellow former lurker, to the forums! Enjoy your stay.

Ah, more of my kin.
You made the right choice in buying the game. I had watched many KSP videos before I bought the game just like you.
